sentences.sContent: They are one of the top football teams in the country now since they beat Lowa last weekend.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are one of the top football teams in the country now since they beat Lowa last weekend.
sentences.sCn: 自从上周末击败爱荷华队后，他们现在已是全国最顶级的足球队之一了。

trans.tranCn: 爱荷华州(美国中西部的一州)
